title: What kind of research paper does a GRE require? - Quora

response.answer_text: GRE is a test to check your English, Maths, and Analytical skills. It has nothing to do with what or how many research paper you have completed. As students, who apply to US universities, come from different countries and education systems, this test bring all the students' educational profile on to a single platform and helps universities to compare one student's profile to other.
